abstract: J.P. Morgan Chase has added another investment banker to its financial institutions group, according to an internal memo. Tod Perkins, who will be a managing director, comes to J.P. Morgan from HSBC Securities, where he was head of the depository institutions group for the Americas. Prior to that, Mr. Perkins was a managing director at Credit Suisse, where he focused on banks.
